creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: tiny image of a reclining yellow horse; horse's side is facing viewer, its head is turned towards hind quarters in profile; thin black outline and detail; horse is poised between two horizontal lines; adhered to small sheet of paper
markings: on back, in pencil: [Baiitsu/ 1783-1856]; and on back of mount, R margin, in ink: [Addiss]
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Horse
